DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To determine maximum tolerate dose fluorouracil cisplatin administer cetuximab concurrently esophageal radiotherapy . ( Phase I ) - To determine complete histological response rate ( surgical resection ) . ( Phase II ) Secondary - To determine progression-free survival overall survival . ( Phase II ) - To determine rate resection negative margin ( R0 ) . ( Phase II ) - To determine overall tolerance neoadjuvant therapy . ( Phase II ) - To determine postoperative morbidity mortality . ( Phase II ) OUTLINE : This multicenter study . This dose-escalation study cisplatin fluorouracil . Patients receive cetuximab IV 2 hour day -7 , IV 1 hour day 1 , 8 , 15 , 22 , 29 . Patients also receive cisplatin IV 1 hour day 1 2 fluorouracil IV continuously day 1-4 , 8-11 , 15-18 , 22-25 , 29-32 . Patients undergo radiotherapy 5 day week 5 week , begin day 1 chemotherapy . Treatment continue absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients undergo surgery within 6-8 week completion chemoradiotherapy . After completion study therapy , patient follow 1 month , every 4 month 2 year , every 6 month 2 year .
